name: Camp Commotion
description: Camp Commotion, Project Commotion’s annual Summer camp, serves children ages 2-6 (toddler - rising 1st graders). Campers explore movement, arts & literacy, social skills, self-discovery, and play. Our rich combination of activities is based on emerging research in neuroscience and child development, which is uncovering the powerful positive influences of movement and creative expression on the developing brain.
